:::Banzai-Tron:::

::he once again flies away from the Iron Fist.  Eventually he find Deemos and 
the others::
Banzai-Tron: Hmm, these guys look tough.
::he lands and looks at Deemos::
Banzai-Tron: hey, can i join your group?
